title: Pippin, Just a Nuisance (4R313)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, discard him to remove an Uruk-hai from a skirmish involving an unbound companion.
Lore:	”'What good have I been?… a passenger, a piece of luggage.'”
Rarity:	R
